name: Emilee Gilpin
body:
Emilee Gilpin@emileegilpin14 Feb 2022This conversation during @iisaakolam's Valentine's Day event on Indigenous love & economics has me thinking about how materially rich ppl can also be spiritually or culturally impoverished, and vice versa. 

Can Indigenous values in economics bring more balance?#Indigenomics6
